Comment: Judge wants to see harm caused by the program? This is beyond ridiculous. A single $1 in welfare from the government should already be deemed harm.   Venezuela is not at war. Let these 350k people apply to be US citizens from Venezuela. Then they can come back. We have an immigration system for a reason.
Author: Reuters-no-bias-lol

Comment: This is such an absurd number to have let in. They all have to be remigrated, this isn't how our immigration system is supposed to work.
